FuncDef: This command creates a text description stored in the configuration file for a configuration context. This associates a text string with a configuration context to help identify the context in the configuration file.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a text string describing the entity. Allowed values are any string up to 80 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters excluding double quotes. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
